title: Girl groups: the story of a sound
creator_credit: Delilah Films, Stephanie Bennett and Steve Alpert
brief_description: Traces the story of the dream girls, punctuating over 25 of their greatest hits with fascinating insights into what went on behind the scenes. Highlighted by rare original footage of the groups performing their hits. Includes : The Chantels, The Shirelles, The Shangri-las, Little Eva, The Supremes and more.
